title: Bloomberg Markets: Lorin on Leaders in Endowment Gains
itunes:title: Bloomberg Markets: Lorin on Leaders in Endowment Gains
description:
Bloomberg Markets with Carol Massar and Cory Johnson. GUEST: Janet Lorin Higher Education Reporter Bloomberg News Discussing Flagship public universities in Colorado and Texas are leading the way in posting double-digit investment gains as U.S. schools begin reporting performance for fiscal 2017.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
